title: Cannot find module 'ethereumjs-wallet/hdkey' by using truffle-config.js
body:
## üéâ Description

I want to use truffle-config.js to deploy my smart contract to testnet like ropsten, kovan. Unfortunately, I always got "Cannot find module 'ethereumjs-wallet/hdkey'" error when I run "trufffle.cmd migrate --reset --network ropsten".

- [x ] üêõ This is a bug report.
- [ ] üìà This is a feature request.

## üíª Environment

Next, we need to know what your environment looks like.

- Which version of OpenZeppelin are you using?
The Master branch.
- What network are you deploying to? Ganache? Ropsten?
Ropsten and kovan.
- How are you deploying your OpenZeppelin-backed contracts? truffle? Remix? Let us know!
truffle.

## üìù Details

Describe the problem you have been experiencing in more detail. Include as much information as you think is relevant. Keep in mind that transactions can fail for many reasons; context is key here.

## üî¢ Code To Reproduce Issue [ Good To Have ]

Please remember that with sample code it's easier to reproduce the bug and it's much faster to fix it.

```
C:\ethereum\JarvisPlusCrowdsale>truffle.cmd migrate --reset --network development
Error: Cannot find module 'ethereumjs-wallet/hdkey'
    at Function.Module._resolveFilename (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:581:15)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:507:25)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:637:17)
    at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:20:18)
    at Object.<anonymous> (C:\ethereum\JarvisPlusCrowdsale\node_modules\truffle-hdwallet-provider\index.js:2:13)
    at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:689:30)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:700:10)
    at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:599:32)
    at tryModuleLoad (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:538:12)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:530:3)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:637:17)
    at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:20:18)
    at Object.<anonymous> (C:\ethereum\JarvisPlusCrowdsale\truffle.js:16:26)
    at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:689:30)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:700:10)
    at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:599:32)
    at tryModuleLoad (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:538:12)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:530:3)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:637:17)
    at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:20:18)
    at Function.Config.load (C:\Users\mic_l\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-config\index.js:254:1)
    at Function.Config.detect (C:\Users\mic_l\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-config\index.js:243:1)
    at Object.run (C:\Users\mic_l\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-core\lib\commands\migrate.js:35:1)
    at Command.run (C:\Users\mic_l\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-core\lib\command.js:101:1)
    at Object.<anonymous> (C:\Users\mic_l\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-core\cli.js:16:1)
    at __webpack_require__ (C:\Users\mic_l\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\webpack\bootstrap f3b0126a12cf2ee05457:19:1)
    at C:\Users\mic_l\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\webpack\bootstrap f3b0126a12cf2ee05457:65:1
    at Object.<anonymous> (C:\Users\mic_l\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\cli.bundled.js:71:10)
    at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:689:30)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:700:10)
    at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:599:32)
    at tryModuleLoad (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:538:12)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:530:3)
    at Function.Module.runMain (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:742:12)
```

<!-- If your code is larger, consider linking us to a repo illustrating your issue. -->

## üëç Other Information
I am using Windows 10 with nodejs 10.7.0.
I can confirm that I have already installed "ethereumjs-wallet" and hdkey.js has been in the sub folder of ethereumjs-wallet in node_modules.

@micli You will find the solution here:

https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle-hdwallet-provider/issues/54

It has been resolved after I installed truffle-hdwallet-provider 0.6.0.
`
npm uninstall ethereumjs-wallet
npm uninstall truffle-hdwallet-provider
npm install ethereumjs-wallet@0.6.0 --save
npm install --save truffle-hdwallet-provider@0.0.3
`
